hotciv.framework

Interface AttackingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EpsilonAttackingStrategy, StandardAttackingStrategy, ZetaAttackingStrategy, ZetaAttackingStrategy20RoundTestStub

    public interface AttackingStrategy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean attackSuccessful(GameState gs, Unit a, Unit d, int attackingSupport, int attackingTerrainFactor, int defendingSupport, int defendingTerrainFactor)
      This method carries out and determines the winning unit after an attack

    • Method Detail

      • attackSuccessful

        boolean attackSuccessful(GameState gs,
                       Unit a,
                       Unit d,
                       int attackingSupport,
                       int attackingTerrainFactor,
                       int defendingSupport,
                       int defendingTerrainFactor)
        This method carries out and determines the winning unit after an attack
        Parameters:
        gs - The current game
        a - attacking unit
        d - defending unit
        attackingSupport - an integer representing the friendly unit contribution around the attacking unit
        attackingTerrainFactor - an integer representing the contribution to the attacking unit from the terrain where the unit currently resides
        defendingSupport - an integer representing the friendly unit contribution around the defending unit
        defendingTerrainFactor -
        Returns:
        True if the attack is successful false otherwise
